EmailTemplate.name: LWC Tutor Request Confirmation - Student
EmailTemplate.subject: [USF] Tutor Request Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for completing a Tutor Request Form {!Case.Contact}.
We will respond to your request within 24-48 hours Monday-Friday. If you need immediate assistance with scheduling, contact the LWC front desk at 415.422.6713.
Please note, we will do our best to connect you with a peer tutor as soon as possible, however not all tutor requests will be fulfilled and it may take several weeks to locate an available tutor. We highly recommend working closely with faculty and classmates whether you do or do not use tutoring.
Notice: Writing Center: Contact the LWC front desk to schedule all Writing appointments. Speaking Center: Email speakingcenter@usfca.edu about scheduling issues.
Thank you,
Learning & Writing Center Staff Cowell 215
